lw1 r0,r1,0000000000000000
addi r1,r7,0000000000000000
addi r4,r4,0000000000000001
lw1 r0,r8,0000000000000001
beq r8,r3,0000000000111100
subi r8,r8,0000000000000001
subi r1,r2,0000000000000010
addi r5,r5,0000000000000001
beq r2,r3,0000000000001000
beq r2,r4,0000000000010010
jmp 00000000000000000000000110
subi r7,r7,0000000000000001
subi r5,r5,0000000000000001
beq r5,r3,1111111111010100
jmp 00000000000000000000001011
addi r5,r5,0000000000000001
subi r7,r7,0000000000000001
subi r5,r5,0000000000000001
beq r5,r3,1111111111001000
jmp 00000000000000000000010000
hal
